scripts.accept: git add . && git commit -m "accept changes" || echo no changes
scripts.goto:version: node -e "import('child_process').then(cp => { cp.execSync('git reset --hard ' + process.argv[1], {stdio:'inherit'}); cp.execSync('npm run dev', {stdio:'inherit'}); })"
scripts.release:patch:push: npm run release:patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor:push: npm run release:minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major:push: npm run release:major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.upload:manual: echo 'Wysy≈Çanie wersji na GitHub...' && git push && git push --tags
